comment: /** * Customize the supplied {@code ConfigurableApplicationContext} after * bean definitions have been loaded into the context but before the * context has been refreshed. * @param context the context to customize * @param mergedConfig the merged context configuration */
code: /** * Customize the supplied {@code ConfigurableApplicationContext} after * bean definitions have been loaded into the context but before the * context has been refreshed. * @param context the context to customize * @param mergedConfig the merged context configuration */ void customizeContext(ConfigurableApplicationContext context, MergedContextConfiguration mergedConfig).
